name: 廖翊鈞
objective:
模型理論，管流理論，渠流理論，渠變理論，數值理論.
Introduction,Model similitude,Pipe flow,Open channel  flow,Gradually varied flow (Backwatercomputation...),Computation fluid mechanics (ex:FDM,FEM,...)
schedule:
第 1 週：Terminology
第 2-3 週：Fluid’s Properties
第 4-5 週：Open Channel Flow
第 6-7 週：Pipe Flow
第 8-9 週：Boundary Theory
第 10-11 週：Weir and Dam
第 12-13 週：Bridge Hydraulics
第 14-15 週：Sediment Transport
第 16-17 週：Numerical and Physical models
